summary: Have you ever wanted to have that glass battle axe of yours in a different color, perhaps your favorite color? Well now you can with the spectral weapons mod!
descriptionHtml: Sure, there are mods out there that change the color of glass weaponry but, they only allow you to have one color at a time. With the spectral weapons mod, this is no longer the case. This mod adds a whole rainbow of powerful weapons letting fight with the power of the rainbow.
author: FraKaeM
